snippet.title: WHOA!!! Amber Heard CUTS OFF Johnny Depp's FINGER?! | The Pascal Show
snippet.description:
JOIN IN MY JOURNEY TO 10,000 SUBSCRIBERS!!!

Johnny Depp talks about how he got his fingered severed by his then wife Amber Heard.... This is NUTS!!! Pascal and the gang talk about this crazy deposition! Check it out and COMMENT BELOW!!!
